definitions.title: n.f.
definitions.body: only pl. kidneys (NH. [[כִּלְיׇה]] (pl.); Aram. [[כּוּלְיׇא]] or [[כּוֹלְיׇא]] (only pl.), kuwlno0; Eth. k=alit: LXX oi( nefroi/);—abs. pl. [[כְּלָיוֹת]] Je 11:20 + 5 t.; [[כְּלָיׁת]] Ex 29:13 + 13 t.; cstr. [[כִּלְיוֹת]] De 32:14, Is 34:6; sf. [[כִּלְיוֹתַי]] Job 16:3 + 2 t.; [[כִּלְיׁתַי]] Job 19:27; [[כִּלְיוֹתָָי]] Ps 16:7, Pr 23:16; [[כִּלְיׁתָָי]] Ps 139:13, La 3:13; [[כִּלְיוֹתֵיהֶם]] Je 12:2; —kidneys:

definitions.title: a.
definitions.body: of man, only poet., as created by ´[[י]] Ps 139:13; as the most sensitive and vital part, in metaph. of one wounded by ´[[י]]'s arrows Job 16:13, La 3:13.

definitions.title: b.
definitions.body: of sacrificial animals, offered as choice part to ´[[י]] Le 3:4, Le 3:10, Le 3:15, Le 4:9, Le 7:4, Le 9:10, Le 9:19; [[שְׁתֵּי]] ´[[הַכּ]] Ex 29:13, Ex 29:22, Le 3:4, Le 3:10, Le 3:15, Le 4:9, Le 7:4, Le 8:16, Le 8:25 (all P); in fig. of sacrif. Edomites [[חֵלֶב כִּלְיוֹת אֵילִים]] Is 34:6; transferred to wheat, [[חֵלֶב כִּלְיוֹת חִטָּה]] De 32:14 kidney-fat (i.e. the choicest, richest) of wheat.

fig., as seat of emotion and affection Job 19:27, Pr 23:16, Ps 16:7, Ps 73:21; [[קָרוֹב אַתָּה בְּפִיהֶם]] ´[[וְרָחוֹק מִכּ]] Je 12:2 near art thou in their mouth, and far from their affections; hence, as involving character, the obj. of God's examination, alw. ‖[[לֵב]]:[[וׇלֵב ]] ´[[כּׂחֵן כ]] Je 11:20 cf. Ps 7:10, ´[[חׂקֵר לֵב כּׂחֵן כ]] Je 17:10, [[וׇלֵב]] ´[[בּׂחֵן חַדִּיק רׂאֶה כ]] Je 20:12, [[וְלִבִּי]] ´[[חָרְו֠פָה כ]] Ps 26:2.
